title: BRIEF-Boeing Selects Spirit Aerosystems To Replace KC-135 Horizontal Stabilizers
text:
* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS HOLDINGS INC - NEW HORIZONTAL STABILIZERS WILL BE PRODUCED AT SPIRIT FACILITY IN TULSA, OKLA

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS HOLDINGS INC - CONTRACT IS FOR AN INITIAL 34 HORIZONTAL STABILIZER KITS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
